channel.title: Changing QP on Skills tab to be pk points
channel.description:
Okay, I was told to put a code in the public boolean process() and it wasn't working. Maybe the wrong spot? But It says QP: 0 because I have 0 quest points. I tried CTRL+F: QP, but nothing would ever come up. I did that in EVERY .java file in my source folder.
[code]sendQuest("PVP: "+pkpoints+"", 3985);[/code]
This is what I was told to put in to change the QP to Represent PK points. It didn't work.
Any help on getting this to work would be extremely nice! Thanks!

item.title: Changing QP on Skills tab to be pk points
item.dc:creator: @OMG_its_NICK OMG its NICK
item.description:
@OMG_its_NICK wrote:

Okay, I was told to put a code in the public boolean process() and it wasn’t working. Maybe the wrong spot? But It says QP: 0 because I have 0 quest points. I tried CTRL+F: QP, but nothing would ever come up. I did that in EVERY .java file in my source folder.

sendQuest("PVP: "+pkpoints+"", 3985);

This is what I was told to put in to change the QP to Represent PK points. It didn’t work.

Any help on getting this to work would be extremely nice! Thanks!
